attributes.action: Brexit means Brexit. Make Theresa May give the people what they voted for!
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has rubbished the Australian points based immigration system. She has distanced herself from the 100 million pound a week extra for the NHS, and now she is saying we may still pay money into the European Union after Brexit despite being no longer a member. This is unacceptable and if you had said this in your race for number 10 you may not even be in office right now.

Give the people what they voted for not what we have now with no membership to Europe Brexit means Brexit!!
attributes.background: For all the people who don't agree with how Theresa May is handling Brexit and disregarding the views of members of vote leave!!
